LanguageData.BFloorPlasteel.label: Plasteel Bars Mosaic
LanguageData.BFloorPlasteel.description: Expensive floor made with plasteel bars, requires a lot of work to build but at least it's beautiful and durable.
LanguageData.AFloorPlasteel.label: Plasteel plates
LanguageData.AFloorPlasteel.description: Floor made with plasteel plates, less expensive than the one made with bars, but also less beautiful.
LanguageData.Sterilelux.label: Sterile Lux
LanguageData.Sterilelux.description: Luxurious sterile tile, to make it need a lot of material and time, but it helps to prevent infections.
LanguageData.AFloorRoyalGold.label: Royal Gold
LanguageData.AFloorRoyalSilver.label: Royal Silver
